document.title: .NET Resources Tab
document.paragraph:
In order to add .NET resources to your .NET system you can use the resources tab, presented below:
../../../../images/eiffelstudio/project_settings/dotnet_resources_tab.png
You can include either .resx or .txt resource files:
The .resx resource file format is a XML based format to include objects (such as images and other binary formats) and strings.
The .txt resource file format can only contains strings.
